GPT stands for Generative Pre-trained Transformer, which is a type of natural language processing (NLP) architecture. It is a deep learning model that is trained on large amounts of text data and is able to generate human-like text. It can be used for tasks such as language translation, text summarization, and text generation. GPT is based on the transformer architecture, which is a type of neural network that is designed to process sequential data. It is pre-trained on a large corpus of text data and is then fine-tuned on a specific task.

Arithmetic mean is the average of a set of numbers. It is calculated by adding all the numbers in the set and then dividing the sum by the number of numbers in the set.
